name: Destiny Fails Us | Otome Game
blurb: A Video Game that follows the life of Idril Ar'Feinel, a girl who spends too much time with video games and not enough on her homework.

rewards.reward:
SPECIAL THANKS PACK
============================== 
Every donation counts :D
Includes your Name in the Credits of the Full Game as well as 5 Desktop Wallpapers Exclusive to Kickstarter that feature all of the Main Romanceable Characters!
DIGITAL DOWNLOAD PACK\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the SPECIAL THANKS PACK and One Digital Download of the Full Game (Windows, Mac, and Linux) at its release!
SOUNDTRACK + DIGITAL GAME PACK\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the DIGITAL DOWNLOAD PACK and the Soundtrack of the game! (MP3)
FULL DIGITAL PACK\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the SOUNDTRACK + DIGITAL GAME PACK and a "Behind The Scenes" Artbook in PDF format, all as a Digital Download.
FULL DIGITAL + BETA ACCESS\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the FULL DIGITAL PACK and Beta Access to the Full Game. Beta Access will be given approximately 2 months prior to release.
STANDARD PHYSICAL BUNDLE\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the FULL DIGITAL PACK on a Destiny Fails Us Custom Flash Drive.
COLLECTOR'S PHYSICAL BUNDLE\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the STANDARD PHYSICAL BUNDLE and a Physical Copy of the Extended Artbook Signed by the Creators.

IDRIL'S STRAWBERRY BAG + DIGITAL PACK ============================== Includes the FULL DIGITAL PACK and a Hand Made Replica of Idril's Strawberry Bag from the Game. The Bag will be Sewn by a Professional Seamstress with 40 years of Sewing Experience.

IDRIL'S STRAWBERRY BAG BUNDLE
============================== 
Includes the COLLECTOR'S PHYSICAL BUNDLE and a Hand Made Replica of Idril's Strawberry Bag from the Game. 
The Bag will be Sewn by a Professional Seamstress with 40 years of Sewing Experience.

IDRIL'S STRAWBERRY BAG BUNDLE ============================== \r\n*** Now with International Shipping *** ============================== Includes the COLLECTOR'S PHYSICAL BUNDLE and a Hand Made Replica of Idril's Strawberry Bag from the Game. The Bag will be Sewn by a Professional Seamstress with 40 years of Sewing Experience.
EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER POSTER BUNDLE ============================== Includes the COLLECTOR'S PHYSICAL BUNDLE and a Poster of your Favorite Character(s) styled to be Unique to you.

BACKGROUND CHARACTER BUNDLE\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the STANDARD PHYSICAL BUNDLE and have yourself included in the Game as a Static Background Character. This character can be Based on You, a Loved One or even a Character of Your Own. We will contact you about details regarding what you would like and where we think you fit into the Destiny Fails Us Universe.

FOREGROUND CHARACTER BUNDLE\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the STANDARD PHYSICAL BUNDLE and have yourself included in the Game as a Foreground Character that Idril will Interact with on Multiple Occasions. This character can be Based on You, a Loved One or even a Character of Your Own. We will contact you about details regarding what you would like and where we think you fit into the Destiny Fails Us Universe.

DESTINY FAILS US CHARACTER COSPLAY BUNDLE
============================== 
Includes the COLLECTOR'S PHYSICAL BUNDLE and a Hand Made School Uniform Outfit from a Character of your choosing in the Game. 
The Outfit will be Sewn by a Professional Seamstress with 40 years of Sewing Experience.

MAIN CHARACTER BUNDLE\r\n============================== \r\nIncludes the COLLECTOR'S PHYSICAL BUNDLE and have yourself included in the Game as a Main Character that Idril will Interact with throughout the Game. This Character will be included on the Stats Screen with their own Affection Meter and will be a Key Character in the Game itself. They will do different things based on the Decisions and Choices the Player makes throughout the game. This character can be Based on You, a Loved One or even a Character of Your Own. We will contact you about details regarding what you would like and where we think you fit into the Destiny Fails Us Universe.
